title: 香港武肺確診數字應該仲畀一個地圖上仲未存在既國家爬左頭

replies.msg:
The Kurdistan Region has nine confirmed cases of the virus, which has wreaked global havoc since appearing in the Chinese city of Wuhan late last year. 

One person died in Sulaimani this week after contracting the disease. 


庫爾德族四個國家入面，唯一一個真係有自己自治政府既伊拉克庫爾德區有9宗個案，1死，呢篇係今日既報導

At least six people in the Iranian Kurdish city of Saqiz have so far died of coronavirus since the outbreak of the novel virus, a monitor revealed on Thursday.

According to the country's health ministry, at least 30 cases were registered in Lorestan while 22 others were in Kermanshah. Meanwhile, 18 people were infected with the virus in Kurdistan and 11 others were in Ilam.
At least 10 other cases were recorded in Western Azerbaijan province, the ministry concluded.


呢篇係前日既報導，30+22+18+11+10=91，伊朗庫爾德區91確診，6死

土耳其同敘利亞未公佈有確診個案，所以呢兩個對應既庫爾德區都無武肺數字
咁即係未成立既庫爾德國至少有91+9=100宗確診，1+6=7宗死亡而因為伊朗個數字係前日既，以佢每日成千咁上，庫爾德區應該都升至少十宗以上啦所以應該已經超左香港車

講開又講埋另兩個西班牙今日數字係441宗，5死，其中加泰有37宗，1死
支那公佈數字，東突厥76宗確診，3死實際就唔知了
土耳其居然未有又封鎖消息？
